title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2047/85 of 24 July 1985 fixing for the 1985/86 marketing year the reference prices for carp
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 2047/85
of 24 July 1985
fixing for the 1985/86 marketing year the reference prices for carp
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The reference price for carp shall be as follows:
- for the period 1 August to 30 November 1985: 1 715 ECU/tonne,
- for the period 1 December to 31 December 1985: 1 462 ECU/tonne,
- for the period 1 January to 31 July 1986: 1 373 ECU/tonne.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 August 1985.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 24 July 1985.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 379, 31. 12. 1981, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 340, 28. 12. 1984, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 207, 29. 7. 1974, p. 30.
(4) See page 15 of this Official Journal.
